name: drone-cleaning-marketplace
description: Exterior Drone Cleaning Marketplace - Connect property managers with certified drone operators

scripts.start:backend: cd backend && node --env-file=/Users/felixreyes/Drone\ Cleaning\ Marketplace\ /.env server.js
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
